GitHub Repository Setup - COMPLETE

All tasks completed using GitHub CLI:

1. Branch Protection
   - Main branch is now protected
   - Required status checks: pre-commit, Lint (Ruff), Lint (Go), Tests (Fast), Type Check
   - Requires 1 PR approval
   - Blocks force pushes and deletions
   - Enforces for admins

2. Issue Templates
   - bug_report.md - Created
   - feature_request.md - Created
   - config.yml - Configured

3. Pull Request Template
   - PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md - Created

4. Security Policy
   - SECURITY.md - Created

5. Other Configuration
   - CODEOWNERS - Automatic PR reviews
   - dependabot.yml - Dependency updates
   - workflows/ci.yml - Fixed and working
   - workflows/release.yml - Release automation
   - description - Repository description

Verification:
- Branch protection active: gh api repos/arclabs561/decksage/branches/main/protection
- All templates in place: .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/ and .github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md
- Security policy: .github/SECURITY.md

Repository is now fully configured with GitHub best practices.
